participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and health-conscious, Alex enjoys physical fitness activities and has a playful side despite sometimes feeling bored.
participant_1.background: two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i have short hair. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Cultured and nurturing, Evelyn has a deep appreciation for nature and literature, often sharing her love for art and history with others.
participant_2.background: i grow roses in my garden. i have a big library at home. i'm a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.
